name: Gel Polish Manicure
description: A gel manicure follows similar steps to a traditional manicure, including nail shaping and cuticle care. However, the key difference in the application of gel polish, which is cured under a UV or LED lamp.

name: Hot Stone Massage
description: A hot stone massage involves the use of smooth, heated stones, typically made of basalt, which is a volcanic rock known for its heat retention properties.

name: Body Massage
description: A full body massage will typically include the back, legs, arms, head, shoulders, and feet. Some providers may also offer a glute massage as part of your full-body treatment, but you’ll be able to discuss this with your therapist beforehand if you’d rather opt out.

name: Microblading
description: Microblading is a cosmetic procedure that involves using a handheld tool with tiny needles to deposit pigment into the skin, mimicking the look of natural eyebrow hairs.

name: Facial
description: A facial is a noninvasive skin treatment that includes cleansing, moisturizing, exfoliating and other elements that are customized to your specific skin type and needs.
